volta pin:
Pin your project's runtime or package manager
eg: volta pin node@lts
volta list --format:
Specify the output format [possible values: human, plain]
eg: volta list --format human
    volta list --format plain
volta install:
Install a tool in your toolchain
eg: volta install yarn@1
volta install node:
Install node
eg: volta install node@lts
    volta install node@16
volta install npm:
Install npm
eg: volta install npm@8
volta install yarn:
Install yarn
eg: volta install yarn@1
volta fetch:
Fetch a tool to the local machine
eg: volta fetch yarn@1
volta fetch node:
Fetch node 
eg: volta fetch node@lts
    volta fetch node@16
volta fetch npm:
Fetch npm
eg: volta fetch npm@8
volta fetch yarn:
Fetch yarn
eg: volta fetch yarn@1
volta uninstall:
Uninstall a tool in your toolchain
eg: volta uninstall yarn@1
volta uninstall node:
Uninstall node 
eg: volta uninstall node@lts
    volta uninstall node@16
volta uninstall npm:
Uninstall npm
eg: volta uninstall npm@8
volta uninstall yarn:
Uninstall yarn
eg: volta uninstall yarn@1
volta which: Locate the actual binary that will be called by Volta
volta which node: Locate the binary file for node
volta which npm: Locate the binary file for npm
volta which yarn: Locate the binary file for yarn
volta run: Run a command with custom Node, npm, pnpm, and/or Yarn versions
volta run --node:
Set the custom Node version
eg: volta run --node <version> <command>
volta run --npm:
Set the custom Npm version
eg: volta run --npm <version> <command>
volta run --yarn:
Set the custom Yarn version
eg: volta run --yarn <version> <command>
volta run --env:
Set an environment variable (can be used multiple times)
eg: volta run --env <NAME=value>
volta run --bundled-npm: Force npm to be the version bundled with Node
volta -v:
--version
Print the current version of Volta
volta help:
Show official help
eg: volta help pin
volta setup: Enable Volta for the current user / shell
volta completions:
Generate Volta completions
You already have completions. You don't need it
